Posts.Content: lolsatlife wrote: Hi I've been looking through topics in this forum for the last few days. Reading this forum is actually making me freak out even more. I'm only 19 years old, and even though I know the risk of having bc is rare, I'm still worried. My right breast started itching about a month ago. And it's a really bad itch.. There are a few lumps on the surface on my breast, but when I press it, it's not hard at all. I guess you could say that my breast is dimpling. My breast has also been giving out some kind of weird discharge that leaves a dried light brown-ish stain on my bras. So- should I be worried?? xxÂ  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 19 and freaking out lolsatlife Abbey11
